Description.Name: Repaired Power Conduits
Description.Details: Running power through patched-together cables all over the decks isnâ€™t reliable or safe. We will need to run new electrical cable through the existing conduits in order to get more systems working on the Argo. If we keep you don't, we're liable to lose a Tech before too long!

AssignedCastDescription: Notably, upgrading the power system will allow us to provide power to more parts of the ship reliably, which means more of the Argo's systems will be operational.
